name: Section
description: Represents a OneNote section. Sections can contain pages.

properties.name: id
properties.description: Gets the ID of the section.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Gets the name of the section.

properties.name: notebook
properties.description: Gets the notebook that contains the section.

properties.name: sectionGroup
properties.description: Gets the section group that contains the section. Returns null if the section is a direct child of the notebook.

methods.name: getPages
methods.description: Gets the collection of pages in the section.

methods.name: addPage
methods.description: Adds a new page to the end of the section.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title of the new page.

methods.name: insertSectionAsSibling
methods.description: Inserts a new section before or after the current section.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location of the new section relative to the current section.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The name of the new section.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fills the proxy object created in JavaScript layer with property and object values specified in the parameter.

parameters.name: param
parameters.description: Accepts parameter and relationship names as delimited string or an array. Or, provide [loadOption](loadoption.md) object.
